workflow_name.description: The name or identifier of the workflow.

created_at.description: The timestamp indicating when this workflow email statistics entry was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp indicating when this workflow email statistics entry was last updated.

email_name.description: The name or identifier of the email.

workflow_action_id.description: The identifier of the action within the workflow that triggered this email.

workflow_id.description: The identifier of the workflow to which this email belongs.

contacts_count.description: The total number of contacts involved in this workflow email statistics.

count_processed.description: The count of emails processed in this workflow.

email_delivered_count.description: The count of emails successfully delivered.

email_opened_unique_count.description: The count of unique contacts who opened the emails.

email_clicked_unique_count.description: The count of unique contacts who clicked on the emails.

email_dropped_count.description: The count of emails that were dropped during the sending process.

email_unsubscribed_count.description: The count of contacts who unsubscribed after receiving this email.

email_spam_reported_count.description: The count of contacts who reported the email as spam.

email_delivered_rate.description: The rate of email deliveries compared to the total processed emails.

email_opened_rate.description: The rate of email opens compared to email deliveries.

email_clicked_rate.description: The rate of email clicks compared to email deliveries.

email_spam_reported_rate.description: The rate of email spam reports compared to email deliveries.

email_bounced_unique_count.description: The count of unique contacts whose emails bounced.
